Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Signs and Symptoms/Urological Manifestations/Urinary Incontinence/Urinary Incontinence, Urge
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Involuntary discharge of URINE that is associated with an abrupt and strong desire to void. It is usually related to the involuntary contractions of the detrusor muscle of the bladder (detrusor hyperreflexia or detrusor instability).
